name: Getting out of it (jerbaloot)
description:
Controls

Arrow keys or WASD to move. Escape the pit! 

Or chill around, I'm just a game description.

Development

I just found this game jam with a few hours to spare! This is my first complete game made in Godot. I spent most of my time on creating the level. I also implemented coyote time and jump buffers to make the jumping experience better. Any feedback would be greatly appreciated! Thank you SOO much for taking the time to check my game out.

No music/sound - means you can play your own music! (I don't know how to make sounds yet)

Resources

Font - Comic Neue ( https://fonts.google.com/specimen/Comic+Neue?query=comic)

Cat Art - Lo Res Cat Spritesheet (https://notsleeping.itch.io/lo-res-cat-spritesheet)

Platformer art (Free version) - https://alfredsheep.itch.io/simple-platformer-premium-8x8-and-16x16

Thanks again for checking this out. Let me know if you have any questions.
